Key Match Events: New Zealand recover from 15-3 to post 167-7
Sri Lanka collapse to 8-4 early before being bowled out for 102
Glenn Phillips brings up stunning century off 61 balls
Post-Match Reflections: Kane Williamson on TMS: 'There’s a lot of cricket left so for us it's about focusing on the next game. As we have seen it doesn’t matter who you play, anyone can beat anyone. There’s match-winners throughout.'

Dasun Shanaka: 'We started really well, especially in the first 10 overs we bowled really well. Glenn Phillips played an outstanding knock but there are areas we can improve, especially in the fielding, we dropped a few catches.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Group 1 leaders NZ now on five points, two clear of England, Ireland and Australia
Others: The match was played on a difficult surface
Trent Boult took 4-13 in the match
